text: @realDonaldTrump Oh for Chrissakes, he's lying to cover up spelling mistakes, too. NO, sarcasm as an excuse for Trump's stupidity never works.  ONE MILLION AMERICANS  infected with #COVID19 and Donald Trump is twisting himself into a pretzel to explain a spelling error in an idiotic tweet.
